tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE films (
  film_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  film_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  rating FLOAT NOT NULL
)
CREATE TABLE films (film_id INT, title VARCHAR(255), genre VARCHAR(50), rating DECIMAL(3,1))
CREATE TABLE actors (actor_id INT, name VARCHAR(100), birth_date DATE, gender CHAR(1))
CREATE TABLE film_actors (film_id INT, actor_id INT, character_name VARCHAR(100))
CREATE TABLE genres (genre_id INT, genre_name VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE ratings (film_id INT, rating DECIMAL(3,1))
